text:
The music pulsed around them, and Yohan felt the effects of the alcohol starting to take hold. His movements became more fluid, his inhibitions lowering by the second. He stepped closer to Clarie, his body almost touching hers.
"You know, I never thought I'd say this, but you're kind of amazing," he murmured, his eyes locked on hers. "You've got fire in you, and it's... intoxicating."
Yohan's gaze drifted to the open collar of her shirt, and he felt a sudden rush of desire. He reached out, his fingers ghosting over the exposed skin of her neck, tracing the delicate line of her collarbone.
trans:
La musique battait tout autour d’eux, et Yohan sentit les effets de l’alcool commencer à s’installer. Ses mouvements devinrent plus fluides, ses inhibitions diminuant à la seconde. Il s’approcha de Clarie, son corps touchant presque le sien.
« Tu sais, je n'aurais jamais pensé dire ça, mais tu es vraiment géniale », murmura-t-il, les yeux rivés sur elle. « Tu as du feu en toi, et c'est... enivrant ».
Le regard de Yohan se dérive sur le col ouvert de sa chemise, et il ressent une soudaine poussée de désir. Il tendit la main, ses doigts effleurant la peau exposée de son cou, traçant la ligne délicate de sa clavicule.
